pageContext.title: Anarchist Alchemist
pageContext.description: About as far as you can push an IPA; Anarchist Alchemist packs in three times the malt and three of our favourite hops. Nelson Sauvin, Amarillo and Centennial bring a range of flavours, touching on tropical fruit, white grape, tangerine, grapefruit, pine, spiced orange... the list goes on!
pageContext.author: Sam Mason <samjbmason>
